alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 05 at 1:11PM PDT until November 07 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulation below 3000 feet between 3 to 7 inches. Total snow accumulations above 3000 feet between 7 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Deer Park, Springdale-Hunters Road, Flowery Trail Road, Newport, Chewelah, Northport, Kettle Falls, Orin-Rice Road, and Colville. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
